程序包 miot.api

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    DeviceConnector.ConnectHandler
    Callback interface used to deliver the result of connecting the device to the xiaomi cloud.
    DeviceManager.AddTimerCompletionHandler
    Callback interface used to deliver the result of add timer.
    DeviceManager.CompletionHandler
    Callback interface used to deliver the execution result.
    DeviceManager.DeviceListener
    Callback interface used to deliver device discovery result.
    DeviceManager.PowerConsumeHandler
    Callback interface used to deliver the power consume query information.
    DeviceManager.QueryFirmwareHandler
    Callback interface used to deliver the device firmware query results.
    DeviceManager.TimerListener
    Callback interface used to deliver timer query information.
    DeviceManipulator.CompletionHandler
    Callback interface used to deliver the execution result.
    DeviceManipulator.EventListener
    Callback interface used to deliver the device's event.
    DeviceManipulator.InvokeCompletionHandler
    Callback interface used to deliver the result of the method invoke on the device
    DeviceManipulator.PropertyChangedListener
    Callback interface used to deliver the device's property change information
    DeviceManipulator.ReadPropertyCompletionHandler
    Callback interface used to deliver the result of read the device's property
    DeviceManipulator.WritePropertyCompletionHandler
    Callback interface used to deliver the result of write the device's property
    PeopleManager.CompletionHandler  
    PeopleManager.LoginCompletionHandler  
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Binding
    A abstract class used to handle bindService and unBindService
    DeviceConnector
    This class used to connect the device to xiaomi cloud
    DeviceManager
    This class provide the Miot device common logic.
    DeviceManipulator
    This class represents the Miot device's ability, see also Device and Service
    MiotManager
    This class used to manage the Miot services.
    MiotMonitor  
    Negotiator  
    PeopleManager
    This class manage the account information. see also People
